source.name: Parsons Problem Example
source.instructions: Drag the code blocks into the box below. Be sure that you only select the blocks you need and that they are in the proper order.
source.initial:
First code block
Second code block
Third code block
Distractor block#distractor
Distractor block#distractor
source.guidance:
Here is the correct answer:

```
First code block
Second code block
Third code block
```

Any code blocks with the word `Distractor` should be ignored and not dragged into the box below.
